title: Duvel logo on beer label
content:
Hi,

Like to know the fonts used in this label, text and logo  
or closest match.

Sheers

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Duvel.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130612012630/http:/typophile.com/files/Duvel_0.jpg) | 102.72 KB |
author: Raf

comments.content:
I think it looks like a custom, simplified blackletter. [FF Brokenscript](http://web.archive.org/web/20130612012630/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=FF.734.0.0) has some similarity, but I think maybe [Caligra](http://web.archive.org/web/20130612012630/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/caligra/) feels closer in more respects, if you just make it wider.

- Mike Yanega
The serif text is -- drum roll -- Adobe Serif Multiple Master substitution font. The horror, the horror ...
